# m-nav-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute     | Description                              | Type                                                                                                                                                              | Default       |
| ------------------- | ------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `icon`              | `icon`        | The icon to display                      | `string \| undefined`                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`   |
| `isActive`          | `is-active`   | Is active nav link                       | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                         | `false`       |
| `isDisabled`        | `is-disabled` | Is disabled nav link                     | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                         | `false`       |
| `navegableProps`    | --            | Props for the nav link navegable variant | `undefined \| { href: string; target?: string \| undefined; 'aria-current': string; }`                                                                            | `undefined`   |
| `optionProps`       | --            | Props for the nav link option variant    | `undefined \| { id: string; type: string; role: string; 'data-bs-toggle': string; 'data-bs-target': string; 'aria-controls': string; 'aria-selected': boolean; }` | `undefined`   |
| `text` _(required)_ | `text`        | Text of nav link                         | `string`                                                                                                                                                          | `undefined`   |
| `variant`           | `variant`     | Variant of nav link                      | `"navegable" \| "option"`                                                                                                                                         | `'navegable'` |
